UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~到目前为止，你通过此节点总共保存了{total_cou:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes! You have saved images {total_count} times with this node so far!
The default save path is a 'ZML' folder inside the output directory, with daily subfolders. Clearing the path defaults to the output directory. Custom paths outside of ComfyUI are supported.
The 'Text Block' stores text within the image, which can be extracted using the Load Image node.
'Clear Metadata' reduces file size. When used with 'Text Block Storage', the workflow is removed, but the text block is saved, allowing for minimal file sizes that still contain prompts.
'Save .txt with same name' saves image info like name, resolution, metadata status, and text block content.
Regarding filename normalization:
The separator is '#-#'. 'Normal' reads the text before the first separator (e.g., 'action#-#000001#-#in_a_dream.PNG' becomes 'action'). 'Reverse' reads the text after the last separator (e.g., 'in_a_dream').
Thank you for using ZML Nodes, have a great day!
UI_TEXT.Name: Name
